meanings.sent1: The forest regenerately regrew after the fire.
meanings.sent2: The plants regenerately bloomed in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to dance regenerately, mimicking human movements.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness spread regenerately throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The healing potion worked regenerately, restoring health instantly.

meanings.sent1: The damaged cells were regenerately repaired by the treatment.
meanings.sent2: The old batteries were regenerately recharged for reuse.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's regenerately fast healing powers amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The regenerately strong bridge withstood the heavy storm.
meanings.sent5: The regenerately growing plant showed signs of new life every day.

meanings.sent1: The lizard's tail was regenerately replaced after being lost.
meanings.sent2: The regenerately skilled chef could turn simple ingredients into gourmet dishes.
meanings.sent3: The regenerately talented artist could paint with both hands simultaneously.
meanings.sent4: The regenerately creative writer could come up with stories on the spot.
meanings.sent5: The regenerately adaptable team quickly adjusted to the new project requirements.
